learning_objectives.description: Understand and use ratio and proportion to give ratios in their simplest form
Understand and use ratio and proportion to divide a quantity in a given ratio
Understand and use ratio and proportion to use proportional reasoning and ratios in context.

subtopic.notes_and_examples:
e.g. 20:30:40 in its simplest form is 2:3:4.
e.g. adapt recipes; use map scales; determine best value.
